message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
I appreciate the gesture of fairness, but I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more fitting since I'm the one making the offer this time. What do you say?
I see you think a 60-40 split is fair when it's in your favor, how about we meet in the middle and make it 57-43?
